itemdesc-handplaner-*:
Use on chiseled blocks to quickly add and remove material.
QPs Chisel Tools Guide
chiseltools-guide-text:
Welcome to QP's Chisel Tools!

Hand Planer Tool
Use on chiseled blocks to quickly add and remove material.
Left Click: Remove a 1 voxel plane
Crouch+Left Click:Remove a 1 voxel plane of the targeted material
Right Click: Add a 1 pixel plane of the selected material
Crouch+Right Click:Extrude the selected material by one voxel'

Hand Wedge Tool
Shifts chiseled blocks by one voxel - voxels that won't fit in the block are deleted.'
itemdesc-handwedge-*:
Pushes chiseled items by one voxel. (Within the cube of the chiseled block)
QPs Chisel Tools Guide
itemdesc-pantograph-*: Allows for copying of another chiseled blocks shape. Press F for options!
